alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Juniata; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 1:21PM EDT until September 07 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... Central Juniata County in central Pennsylvania... Central Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 121 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colonel Denning State Park, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bloomfield, Spruce Hill, Mexico, Walnut, Bloserville, Colonel Denning State Park, Loysville, Ickesburg, Port Royal and Landisburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
